wordGroup: springboard diving n. 弹板跳水

sentences.en: The 1981 budget was the springboard for an economic miracle.
sentences.cn: 1981年的预算造就了一场经济奇迹。

sentences.en: The document provided a springboard for a lot of useful discussion.
sentences.cn: 这份文件引发出许多有益的讨论。

sentences.en: Teachers can use Inanimate Alice as a springboard to create guided discovery lessons on the cultures and countries represented.
sentences.cn: 教师可以利用《无生命的爱丽丝》作为跳板，创建关于所代表的文化和国家的引导探索课程。
